lead_paragraph: A militia has allowed Libya’s National Oil Company to export through ports it controls. The increase in production, however, could offset much of the cuts planned by OPEC.

headline.print_headline: Libya Starts Expanding Oil Exports, Though Some Experts Doubt It Will Last
headline.main: Libya Starts Expanding Oil Exports — for Now, at Least
